To see what's involved in getting 3.x-style tests moved over to
version 4-s=
tyle tests, I started working with the tests for Jaggregate
(http://jaggreg=
ate.sf.net), my Java 5-only project.  I've written a
blog entry containing =
my initial findings:

http://cleveralias.blogs.com/thought_spearmints/2005/=

oon.
